name: clicksend
label: ClickSend
description: ClickSend is business communications software enabling companies of all shapes and sizes to easily send and receive SMS, Voice API.

fields.title: Server URL
fields.name: url
fields.description: Specify the URL of the ClickSend server to which you will connect and perform the automated operations.

fields.title: Username
fields.name: username
fields.description: Specify the username to access ClickSend

fields.title: Password
fields.name: password
fields.description: Specify the API Key to access ClickSend

fields.title: Verify SSL
fields.name: verify_ssl
fields.description: Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified or not. By default, this option is set as True

operations.title: Send Message
operations.description: Send an SMS message to a given number

parameters.title: Message
parameters.name: body
parameters.tooltip: Specify the body of the message to be sent
parameters.description: Specify the body of the message to be sent

parameters.title: To
parameters.name: to
parameters.tooltip: Recipient's phone number
parameters.description: Specify the phone number of recipient.

parameters.title: From
parameters.name: from
parameters.tooltip: Specify the sender ID that shows on the recipients phone when they receive the SMS.
parameters.description: Specify the sender ID that shows on the recipients phone when they receive the SMS.

parameters.title: Schedule
parameters.name: schedule
parameters.tooltip: Specify the date and time when the message should be sent. Leave blank for immediate delivery.
parameters.description: Specify the date and time when the message should be sent. Leave blank for immediate delivery.

parameters.title: Custom String
parameters.name: custom_string
parameters.tooltip: Specify your reference. It will be passed back with all replies and delivery reports.
parameters.description: Specify your reference. It will be passed back with all replies and delivery reports.

parameters.title: Country
parameters.name: country
parameters.tooltip: Specify ISO alpha-2 character country code e.g. 'US', to format the recipient number if it's not in international format.
parameters.description: Specify ISO alpha-2 character country code e.g. 'US', to format the recipient number if it's not in international format.

parameters.title: List ID
parameters.name: list_id
parameters.tooltip: Specify the list ID if sending to a whole list. Can be used instead of 'to' you can get the list ID from Get Contact List action.
parameters.description: Specify the list ID if sending to a whole list. Can be used instead of 'to' you can get the list ID from Get Contact List action..

parameters.title: Email
parameters.name: from_email
parameters.tooltip: Specify email address where the reply should be emailed to. If omitted, the reply will be emailed back to the user who sent the outgoing SMS.
parameters.description: Specify email address where the reply should be emailed to. If omitted, the reply will be emailed back to the user who sent the outgoing SMS.

parameters.description: Specify the page number to return in the response.
